targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  summary_date AS "time",
  active_energy_burned as "Active Energy Burned",
  active_energy_burned_goal as "Goal"
FROM hk_activity_summary
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(summary_date)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: When did I meet my Move goals?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
  total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    active_energy_burned >= active_energy_burned_goal
  ORDER BY 1
) n1

panels.title: How often do I meet my move goal?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  summary_date AS "time",
  apple_exercise_time as "Exercise Time",
  apple_exercise_time_goal as "Goal"
FROM hk_activity_summary
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(summary_date)
ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",

FROM (

    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM

panels.title: How often do I meet my exercise goal?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  summary_date AS "time",
  apple_stand_hours as "Stand Hours",
  apple_stand_hours_goal as "Goal"
FROM hk_activity_summary
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(summary_date)

panels.title: Do I meet my Stand goals?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
  total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    apple_stand_hours >= apple_stand_hours_goal
  ORDER BY 1

panels.title: How often do I meet my stand goal?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  --to_char(summary_date, 'Day') AS "day",
  summary_date as "time",
  -- 1 as "All Goals Met"
  to_char(summary_date, 'Day') AS "All Goals Met"
FROM hk_activity_summary
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(summary_date)
AND
  active_energy_burned >= active_energy_burned_goal
AND
  apple_exercise_time >= apple_exercise_time_goal
AND 
  apple_stand_hours >= apple_stand_hours_goal
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  --to_char(summary_date, 'Day') AS "day",
  summary_date as "time",
  -- 1 as "All Goals Met"
  to_char(summary_date, 'Day') AS "Goals Not Met"
FROM hk_activity_summary
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(summary_date)
AND (
  active_energy_burned < active_energy_burned_goal
  OR
  apple_exercise_time < apple_exercise_time_goal
  OR 
  apple_stand_hours < apple_stand_hours_goal
)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: How often do I close all my rings?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  goal_met_days as "Met Goal",
  total_days as "Total Days",
  goal_met_days / total_days as "Achievment Rate"
FROM (
  SELECT
    count(summary_date) as goal_met_days,
    DATE_PART('day', 
                 to_timestamp('${__to:date:seconds}')  - 
                 to_timestamp('${__from:date:seconds}')
      ) as total_days
  FROM
    hk_activity_summary
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(summary_date)
  AND
    active_energy_burned >= active_energy_burned_goal
  AND
    apple_exercise_time >= apple_exercise_time_goal
  AND 
    apple_stand_hours >= apple_stand_hours_goal
  ORDER BY 1
) n1

panels.title: How often do I meet all my goals?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyMass'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Lean Body Mass"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierLeanBodyMass'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  start_date as time,
  hk_value as "Body Fat %"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBodyFatPercentage'
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_date - start_date))) as "Time in Bed"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierSleepAnalysis'
AND 
  hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysisInBed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Exercise Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleExerciseTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Resting"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierBasalEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Active"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierActiveEnergyBurned'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Steps"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierStepCount'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Flights Climbed"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierFlightsClimbed'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  creation_date::date as time,
  sum(hk_value) as "Distance"
from hk_quantity_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierDistanceWalkingRunning'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', NULL),
  sum(hk_value) as "Stand Time"
FROM 
  public.hk_quantity_record
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKQuantityTypeIdentifierAppleStandTime'
AND
  hk_source = 'Nathaniel’s Apple Watch'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

select
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, '1d', 0),
  count(hk_value) as "# of Hour Stood 1 min"
from hk_category_record 
where 
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
AND
  hk_type = 'HKCategoryTypeIdentifierAppleStandHour'
AND
  hk_value = 'HKCategoryValueAppleStandHourStood'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
